element_text:
{"chunk": "hedge of future cash flows, the value adjustments are
recognised directly in equity.
Tilgodehavender og gæld i fremmed valuta er indregnet til
balancedagens kurs.
Receivables and debt denominated in foreign currencies
have been recognised at the exchange rate of the
balance sheet date.
Realiserede og urealiserede valutakursfortjenester og -tab
er indregnet i resultatopgørelsen under andre finansielle", "context": "This chunk describes the company's accounting policies for the translation of foreign currency transactions and balances, including the recognition of realised and unrealised foreign exchange gains and losses."}
